name: Bio-Dome Home
description:
Bio-Dome Home

You find yourself on a wasteland that was planet earth.
The Bio-Dome is finally completed and ready for habitation!

Save a few lost animals by bringing them back to the Bio-Dome.
Befriending them with what they like and they will let you pick them up!

Controls

WASD/Arrows - Movement
Spacebar/Enter - Action (pickup/putdown)

Credits

Programming/Art - Ryan Mazzolini
Music/Art - Sarah-Jane Walton
